sorcer.util

Class Crypt

  • java.lang.Object
    • sorcer.util.Crypt

  • public class Crypt
extends Object
    This is an implementation of the crypt() algorithm of DES encryption. Code is ported from c to java by Rob Vermeulen (6-14-96). C-code was written by David Ljung (3-25-94). Tables were taken form simple_crypt.c by Michael Glad (glad@daimi.aau.dk) (Copyright 1996 under GNU Public License) The crypt() function is used for attribute encryption in metaweb.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Crypt() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String crypt(String passwd, String s)
      This method decodes the given password Encryption is based on the one way DES encryption
      static void main(String[] argv)
      main method allows you to call crypt function from command line usage : java Crypt

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • crypt

        public String crypt(String passwd,
           String s)
        This method decodes the given password Encryption is based on the one way DES encryption
        Parameters:
        passwd - is the password to encrypt
        s - is salt
        Returns:
        The encrypted password

      • main

        public static void main(String[] argv)
        main method allows you to call crypt function from command line usage : java Crypt
